qoute: A cock has great influence on his own dunghill.
A teacher affects eternity; he can never tell where his influence stops.
Absences are a good influence in love and keep it bright and delicate.
Bad philosophers may have a certain influence; good philosophers, never.
Blessed is the influence of one true, loving human soul on another.
Clothes make the man. Naked people have little or no influence on society.
Every life is a profession of faith, and exercises an inevitable and silent influence.
A cock has great influence on his own dunghill.
A teacher affects eternity; he can never tell where his influence stops.
Absences are a good influence in love and keep it bright and delicate.
Bad philosophers may have a certain influence; good philosophers, never.
Blessed is the influence of one true, loving human soul on another.
Clothes make the man. Naked people have little or no influence on society.
Every life is a profession of faith, and exercises an inevitable and silent influence.
Few have heard of Fra Luca Parioli, the inventor of double entry
Grace is the beauty of form under the influence of freedom.
In order to influence a child, one must be careful not to be that child's parent or grandparent.
Influence is like a savings account. The less you use it, the more you've got.
Influence: What you think you have until you try to use it.
It would be difficult to exaggerate the degree to which we are influenced by those we influence.
It's frightful that people who are so ignorant have so much influence.
Listening well is as powerful a means of communication and influence as to talk well.
The function of prayer is not to influence God, but rather to change the nature of the one who prays.
The humblest individual exerts some influence, either for good or evil, upon others.
The proper time to influence the character of a child is about a hundred years before he is born.
The secret of my influence has always been that it remained secret.
The way you think, the way you behave, the way you eat, can influence your life by 30 to 50 years.
There is no power on earth that can neutralize the influence of a high, simple and useful life.
What the rest of us see only under the influence of mescalin, the artist is congenitally equipped to see all the time.
Who shall set a limit to the influence of a human being?
Woman's influence is powerful, especially when she wants something.
You cannot antagonize and influence at the same time.
You stars that reigned at my nativity, whose influence hath allotted death and hell.
